div.p: This page provides a list of the FHIR artifacts defined as part of this implementation guide.
Capabilities of systems claiming to be conformant to the SDC implementation guide

tr.td: SDC Form authoring system
SDC Form response management system
SDC System for completing forms
SDC Repository for forms
SDC Repository for completed forms
SDC System for archiving and retrieving the completed forms

div.p: Constraints on FHIR resources to be adhered to as part of the SDC implementation guide

tr.td: Sets expectations for SDC-conformant systems around how to create questionnaires
Defines additional capabilities for controlling the rendering of the questionnaire.
Defines additional capabilities for controlling data entry and calculating values within the questionnaire.
Defines elements that support auto-population and pre-population of questionnaires
Defines elements that allow conversion of a QuestionnaireResponse to a FHIR resource or Bundle of FHIR resources
Defines the metadata that should be present to embedding a adaptive Questionnaire as part of a QuestionnaireResponse
Defines the metadata that should be present to support searching for adaptive questionnaires.
Sets expectations for SDC-conformant systems around how to create responses to questionnaires.
Represents a response to a questionnaire that is dynamically built as each question is answered.
Sets expectations for SDC-conformant systems around the definition of value sets for use with questionnaires.
Sets expectations for SDC-conformant systems around the definition of code systems to provide values for choices within questionnaires.

div.p: Extensions defined as part of the SDC implementation guide

tr.td: The base URL for the server to which questionnaire response associated with this questionnaire should be submitted
If set to true, it means that the system displaying the form (or the individual encoding the form for data capture) can choose to omit the item from display to the user.
If true, indicates that QuestionnaireResponse instances created against this questionnaire must have an associated Provenance record.
A Batch Bundle containing a set of queries that should be executed to provide source data for a StructureMap to create a populated QuestionnaireRsponse
A FHIRPath expression or FHIR Query that resolves to a list of candidate answers for the question item or that establishes context for a group item
A FHIR Query that resolves to one or more resources that can be displayed to the user to help provide context for answering a question

div.p: ValueSets (and Code Systems) defined for use within the SDC implementation guide

tr.td: Species for defining the context of Questionnaires

div.p: Additional operations defined for use within the SDC implementation guide

tr.td: Returns the next question or set of questions for an adaptive questionnaire
Allows submission of a QuestionnaireRespone for 'processing' by the target server
Converts a QuestionnaireResponse to a clinical or administrative resource or a Transaction Bundle of them

div.p: Additional search parameters defined for use within the SDC implementation guide

tr.td: Allows searching by 'definition' element within a Questionnaire's items

div.p: Example(s) showing the use of the SDC profiles

tr.td: Example showing most of the advanced rendering capabilities of SDC
Set of several examples - medication, AHRQ and NCI forms
Cancer pathology questionnaire with flow-control extensions
LOINC perspective on the AHRQ form found in the SDC - Combination set of questionnaires
LOINC US Surgeon General family history including data elements and value sets.

td.a: • SDC - Response to Diagnosis NCI Standard Template

tr.td: Responses to the questionnaire found in the SDC - Combination list of questionnaires
Example response to the SDC-LOINC USSG Family History questionnaire
The answer list for question 1 on the AHRQ 'Medication or Other Substance' form
